file(GLOB SRC "*.cpp")
if(POLICY CMP0063)
  cmake_policy(SET CMP0063 NEW)
endif()
add_library(cryptopp_static STATIC ${SRC})
set_target_properties(cryptopp_static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME cryptopp)
target_include_directories (cryptopp_static PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
target_compile_features(cryptopp_static PRIVATE cxx_std_11)
set_property(TARGET cryptopp_static PROPERTY POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_property(TARGET cryptopp_static PROPERTY CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden)
set_property(TARGET cryptopp_static PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 11)
set_property(TARGET cryptopp_static PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
add_library(cryptopp_object OBJECT ${SRC})

set_property(TARGET cryptopp_object PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 11)
set_property(TARGET cryptopp_object PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
file(GLOB SRC "*.cpp")
if(POLICY CMP0063)
  cmake_policy(SET CMP0063 NEW)
endif()
